items.raw_desc: Szervízkészlet Sixtol Sada na odvzdušnění brzd Mechanic Brake Bleeding set:With the practical MECHANIC BRAKE BLEEDING SET 8 you can change brake fluid at home. Brake fluid has the ability to absorb moisture in the air, lowering its boiling point and adversely changing its operating characteristics. When its boiling point drops (greater than 230 °C for a new fluid), high temperatures are generated during prolonged braking and the fluid, which has even the slightest water content, turns to steam. The resulting vapour is compressible and thus reduces the effects of the brake fluid.     Use: Remove the wheel where you plan to vent. Open the fluid in the brake fluid reservoir and top it up if necessary. Start at the furthest point from the brake fluid reservoir (usually the rear right wheel) and work your way to the nearest point (front left wheel). A helper in the cab slowly presses the brake pedal and keeps it depressed. At this point, loosen the bolt or valve on the bleeder valve of the brake caliper or cylinder unit.
